submittedOn.description: The date the foreign income was added. It must be provided in the format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:sssZ

foreignEarnings.description: The container that holds the key value for foreign earnings

customerReference.description: A customer-supplied reference to identify the foreign income. Must be between 1 and 90 characters in length.

earningsNotTaxableUK.description: The income received in a foreign country that could not be transferred to UK because of exchange controls. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places. The currency must be GBP.

items.description: Financial details about unremittable foreign income

countryCode.description: A three-letter code that represents a country name. The value must in a ISO 3166-1 Alpha-3 format.

amountInForeignCurrency.description:
The total amount of foreign currency.

The amount should be in the local currency of the country for the income with the given countryCode field.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.  Fractional currency units are only supported up to 2 decimal places.

amountTaxPaid.description:
The amount of tax paid on foreign income.

The amount should be in the local currency of the country for the income with the given countryCode field.

The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.  Fractional currency units are only supported up to 2 decimal places.
